name: Untitled Notepad Adventure
description:
CW - A variety of "silly" d**ths,  one religious joke, cartoon violence, a carnivorous monster

Untitled Notepad Adventure was created in 2017. It has only been published right now.

As the non-title suggests, the text seen here was originally written in a Notepad document, and each segment of text was given a number. These numbers are preserved in this version, along with the rest of the text. The only change was creating the links between parts.

So sit back and cast your eyes upon this brief and mildly interesting adventure!
